name: Sticky Notes File
summary: An SNT file contains a Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10 user's sticky notes, created by the Sticky Notes app bundled with Windows. When opened with Sticky Notes, the notes an SNT file contains appear as sticky notes attached to a user's desktop. Sticky Notes automatically saves a user's notes to their SNT file whenever the user edits a note.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
